New Records: The New York Mets made history as the first team to clinch a postseason spot in a win and win a playoff series both via games in which they faced a deficit in the 9th inning or later
Key Match Events: Pete Alonso hit a go-ahead three-run homer in the top of the 9th inning, and Starling Marte added a single to secure the 4-2 victory
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Mets were 24-35 at one point this season but turned it around in the final 90 games to make the playoffs; The team hadn't reached the World Series since 2015
